name: DistrOS /boot/horn
short_description: The "portable" version of the DistrOS Multiboot System that can be installed and used with most linux distros. Useful for building custom multiboot usb keys and HDD's, A part of the DistrOS family (https://sourceforge.net/projects/distroslinux/).
